titleInfo.title: 'File 6/5B Miscellaneous correspondence with His Highness the Shaikh of Bahrain and those allied to the royal family'

physicalDescription.extent: The file is arranged chronologically from the front to the rear of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 8; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.A previous foliation sequence, which is also circled, has been superseded and therefore crossed out.

mods.abstract: The file contains a letter of condolence from the Political Agent, Bahrain, Cornelius James Pelly, to Alawi bin Sayid Said for the death of his father, as well as the latter's reply of thanks. The file also contains letters from the Political Agent to Shaikh Salman bin Hamad Al Khalifah [Salmān bin Ḥamad Āl Khalīfah], ruler of Bahrain, covering correspondence from the Governor General of India, Lord Mountbatten.Folio 7 contains internal office notes.
